subtitle.text: Don't see what you're looking for?

ddr3.question: Why does CircleLink have DDR3 ram as a option to choose from?
ddr3.answer: The answer is really simple. We want to make our server accessible for every user on the market. Also the budget users. By giving everyone the option to choose between DDR3 or DDR4 ram, budget users can choose our DDR3 ram option. In most cases DDR3 ram is fast enough to start with and is a bit cheaper than DDR4 ram. Check what the best option is in your case or contact our support. They are happy to help you to choose the best option for you!

palican.question: Why does CircleLink use Palican panel?
palican.answer: Palican panel is a more advanced panel and can be used for every game server you want. Palican has some newer features that pterodactyl hasn't and is more up to date. Because of that we prefer Palican above Pterodactyl. In case you want back to the OG pterodactyl you could get a VPS or Dedicated server and install it yourself. Our support team would be happy to help you through the installation!

webhosting.question: What version of PHP and MySQL do I get with Web Hosting when I use CircleLink?
webhosting.answer: Web Hosting comes with PHP 8.x, 7.x, 5.6 and the latest versions of MySQL 5.6. These are a key requirement for Magento, CMS-Drupal and OpenCart websites and anyone running multiple WordPress websites.

locations.question: Where are your servers located?
locations.answer: Our servers are strategically placed in various datacenters across Nederland. Our primary locations are in Utrecht & Hardewijk

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We offer various payment methods for your convenience. You can pay with iDEAL, PayPal, credit card (Visa/Mastercard). For business customers, it's also possible to pay by invoice. All payments are processed securely, and you'll receive immediate confirmation of your payment.

features: Immediate access thanks to our system. Instantly online

Full cost control through our payment system

gameDescriptions.minecraft: Express your creativity on a Minecraft server, alone or with friends? Start your server today with CircleLink!
gameDescriptions.rust: Survive in the harsh world of Rust, where every player is a potential enemy. Build your base, form alliances, and fight to survive.
gameDescriptions.ark: Fight to survive in a world full of dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Tame dinos, build bases, and explore a vast island.
gameDescriptions.palworld: Dive into Palworld, the groundbreaking game that takes adventurers to a world where survival, building, and catching Pals are central.
gameDescriptions.satisfactory: Build massive factories, automate production lines, and explore a mysterious alien planet in this first-person factory-building game.
gameDescriptions.sotf: Survive the horrors of a mysterious island full of cannibalistic mutants. Build, fight, and explore in this terrifying survival horror game.
gameDescriptions.fivem: Create your own GTA experience with FiveM, the platform that makes it possible to run custom roleplay servers in the world of GTA V.
gameDescriptions.gmod: A sandbox game with endless possibilities. Create your own game types, build constructions, and experiment with the physics properties.
gameDescriptions.theforest: Survive after a plane crash on a forested peninsula full of cannibalistic tribes. Build, explore, and defend yourself against the dangers of the forest.

pelicanPanel.title: Palworld Server Control
pelicanPanel.subtitle: With The Pelican Panel
pelicanPanel.description: The Pelican Panel is an easy-to-use game control panel that lets you control your game server with a few clicks. You can start, stop, restart your server, install mods, change maps, and much more.

feature1.title: Easy to use
feature1.description: Our intuitive interface makes server management extremely simple.

feature2.title: One-click mod installation
feature2.description: Install mods with a single click directly from the control panel.

feature3.title: Map configuration
feature3.description: Easily change maps and configure map settings.

feature4.title: Instant restart
feature4.description: Restart your server instantly with a single click.
